definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city

sentences.english: Brossard is the most ethnically diverse municipality in Quebec.
sentences.chinese: 宝沙是魁北克种族最多样化的直辖市。

sentences.english: Tianjin is one of the four municipalities in China.
sentences.chinese: 天津是中国的四个直辖市之一。

sentences.english: Municipalities, and other urban authorities are now investing in tree growing as well.
sentences.chinese: 直辖市和其他城市当局正在着力树生长的。

sentences.english: Shuntian Prefecture was subordinated by central authority and had no relationship of command with Zhili viceroy.
sentences.chinese: 顺天府由中央直辖，与直隶总督并无统属关系。

sentences.english: A special administrative region directly under the entral government is set up in Hong Kong upon its return.
sentences.chinese: 香港回归祖国之后，设立直辖与人民政府特别行政区。

sentences.english: The crown colony had been under Japanese occupation for almost four years. (AP Photo)
sentences.chinese: 这个英国直辖殖民地从此结束了近4年的日本占领史。

sentences.english: In China's sometimes confusing administrative nomenclature, Chongqing is called a municipality, one of only four that enjoy provincial-level status (the others are Beijing, Shanghai and Tianjin).
sentences.chinese: 用中国令人困惑的行政术语来说，重庆是直辖市。

definition: to govern/to have complete control over/to be in command of
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district

special administrative region (SAR), of which there are two in the PRC: Hong Kong 香港 and Macau 澳門|澳门/refers to many different areas during late Qing, foreign occupation, warlord period and Nationalist government/refers to special zones in North Korea and Indonesia
municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
to belong to (a category)/to be attached to
